titleStmt.title: Old Testament + Anthologia Palatina; writing exercise of a christian author, including alphabet, tachygraphy, Psalm 067 and Anthologia Palatina 09.538 (pangramma)

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Julia Lougovaya-Ast 2018-07-20: "Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add MP 2704.7; delete vol. #; in text, v. l. 3, change κναξξ to κναξζ."
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Julia Lougovaya-Ast 2018-07-20: "Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add MP 2704.7; delete vol. #; in text, v. l. 3, change κναξξ to κναξζ."

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2018.07.04 by Marco Perale. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: "I am in the process of entering all hexameter pangrammata. Transcription has been checked by Rodney Ast. I deleted one of the five ψ in verso 6 (only four visible from the online image; change has been 'approved' by Julia Lougovaya). Moved content from Legacy Display Name to Description, added dimension, updated online resources"
